sys_update_xml.name: sp_css_c2fb91f12f7e3010cf61d0e62799b67b
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_css"><sp_css action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css>/* PANELS */
.us-accordion.panel-group .panel, 
.us-accordion .panel{
	border-radius: 0 !important;
}

.us-accordion .panel-heading{
	padding: 0px;
  	border-top-right-radius: 0;
  	border-top-left-radius: 0;
}

.us-accordion .panel-title a{
	width: 100%;
  	height: 100%;
  	display: inline-block;
  	padding: 16px;
  	font-family: "Source Sans Pro";
  	font-size: 16px;
  	font-style: normal;
  	font-weight: 700;
  	
}

.us-accordion .panel-title a .uswds-icon{
	font-weight: 100;
  	font-size: 16px;
}


</css><name>Bootstrap Override Accordion</name><sys_class_name>sp_css</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-09-25 09:35:53</sys_created_on><sys_id>c2fb91f12f7e3010cf61d0e62799b67b</sys_id><sys_mod_count>21</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Bootstrap Override Accordion</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_css_c2fb91f12f7e3010cf61d0e62799b67b</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-09-25 14:15:40</sys_updated_on></sp_css></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_d72062b52f327010cf61d0e62799b624
sys_update_xml.payload: customc.wps_code_showcase{ border: 1px solid #ccc; margin: 8px; padding: 8px; border-radius: 4px; } .tab-content .tab-pane{ padding: 8px; }sp_instancetruecode_showcasefalseCode Showcase[{"hint":"Place the widget ID of the widget you wish to display in the Code Showcase panel","name":"widget_id","section":"Data","label":"Widget ID","type":"string"},{"hint":"Title of the About section","name":"about_header","section":"Data","default_value":"About","label":"About Header","type":"string"},{"hint":"Describe the widget you are presenting","name":"about_content","section":"Data","default_value":"This widget is a prime example of how instance options work! Please me with more meaningful information because this is just sample text...","label":"About Content","type":"string"},{"hint":"Header for the widget options section","name":"widget_options_header","section":"Data","default_value":"Widget Options","label":"Widget Options Header","type":"string"},{"hint":"Describe the widget/code options that are available","name":"widget_options_content","section":"Data","default_value":"Sample information that should be replaced with something more meaningful.","label":"Widget Options Content","type":"string"},{"hint":"Header for Instance Options","name":"widget_instance_options_header","section":"Data","default_value":"Widget Instance Example","label":"Widget Instance Options Header","type":"string"},{"hint":"Describe the instance options for this code or widget","name":"widget_instance_options_content","section":"Data","default_value":"Sample text that should be replaced with something more meaningful.","label":"Widget Instance Options Content","type":"string"},{"hint":"The title for the product/code being presented","name":"showcase_title","section":"Data","default_value":"ShowCase Header","label":"ShowCase Title","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2021-09-25 14:34:05d72062b52f327010cf61d0e62799b62443Code Showcaseglobalglobalsp_widget_d72062b52f327010cf61d0e62799b624admin2021-09-25 15:54:26
